Bro Gwaun School, Fishguard, Pembrokeshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Solo Horn, Burry Port Town Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2012, 8:40 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:17 p.m.
1 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne Vivat!
2 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies Between the Moon and Mexico
3 Abergavenny Borough Band Craig Roberts Trittico [Curnow]
4 Pontardulais Town Band Paul Jenkins The Essence of Time
Withdrawn City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
Withdrawn Markham and District Band Gareth Pritchard
